DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine glycemic index commonly consume sweetener .
DOC.detailed_description: This three arm study intend add scientific knowledge provide accurate assessment glycemic index commonly consume food item . This used scientific literature ass glycemic index food contain various sweetener . Participants monitor total 10 week . The glycemic index define `` incremental area glucose response curve standard amount carbohydrate relative control food ( white bread glucose ) consume . '' In general , glycemic index quantifies relative effect carbohydrate content food resultant blood glucose .
DOC.criteria: BMI 18.524.9 ( lean ) medication weight change previous 6 month ( define > =10 % change body weight ) current active participation weight loss program ( dietary physical activity focus ) prior bariatric surgery significant medical condition cardiac pulmonary disease , coagulopathy , gastrointestinal disorder , know history Type 1 Type 2 diabetes woman pregnant lactating medication ( except oral contraceptive , thyroxin , drug hypertension , drug osteoporosis , vitamins mineral ) major medical surgical event require hospitalization past 3 month disease drug influence digestion
